fraction numerator a over denominator b minus square root of c end fraction equals fraction numerator begin display style a end style over denominator begin display style b minus square root of c end style end fraction cross times fraction numerator begin display style b plus square root of c end style over denominator begin display style b plus square root of c end style end fraction equals fraction numerator begin display style a open parentheses b plus square root of c close parentheses end style over denominator begin display style b squared minus space c end style end fraction
